statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -15 \\ -14 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 32 \\ 30 \\ -35 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
